Title: Ame to Shoujo to Watashi no Tegami
Description: [' Katari, a young girl who dreams of becoming a novelist, writes a love letter to a boy at her school. Unwittingly, she is creating a "short story" that will move a little girl\'s heart. ', '\n', '\n']
